content: cozy up with the fireside infinity scarf this easy-to-follow crochet pattern creates a beautifully textured warm and stylish infinity scarf perfect for chilly days the pattern includes detailed instructions and yarn alternatives get your hook ready and create your own fireside comfort lion brand - heartland yarn - 5oz/142g - 251 yd/230m - 100% acrylic - category 4 medium - 8 wpi - 3 skeins hook k 6 5 mm dimensions - 60 inches in circumference x 11 5 inches wide link to a video tutorial included
